availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: If set to 1: verbose output (more parameters)
Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned
The parameter the output should be sorted by.  Must be one of the following:  OBJECTCLASS,OBJECTCLASSDESC,OBJECTID,OBJECTIDDESC
Depth of the list, may be SELF, SUBUSER or ALL
Filter query result by the object class stated here
Filter the query result by the object ID stated here
